CZ.name: The Whitakers present Milton & Friends 3D
CZ.description: Up to 20 cute foals are waiting to have fun and be looked after by you. Fall in love with their adorable expressions as they come right up to you in 3D! - Choose from over 25 breeds, such as Andalusians, Tersks and more. - Use the microphone and call your foal for attention. - Comprehensive story mode included with integrated photo album! - StreetPass™: hold beauty contests with other nearby players and win cool in-game extras! - Augmented Reality: using the AR card you can now have your own cute foal right in your hand!
